title: The Naked Noodle
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, International, Fast food, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Casual noodle restaurant featuring noodles from most cuisines. Dishes are set with the option to add additional toppings. The several vegan dishes are clearly marked. Diners also can customize their dish with their choice of noodles, sauce, toppings and protein (including tofu).
